text: The Victoria Royals are a Canadian ice hockey team. They began playing in 2011. The team currently plays in the Western Hockey League. They play their home games in Victoria, British Columbia at the Save-On-Foods Memorial Centre. They originally played in Chilliwack, British Columbia as the Chilliwack Bruins from 2006 to 2011 before relocating to Victoria in 2011 and becoming the Royals. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2011 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in British Columbia Category:Western Hockey League Category:Victoria, British Columbia
title: Victoria Royals
